channel.title: Super Epic Move
channel.description: I was just wondering, on some servers I've played, I've seen the owners use some kind of super amazing beast move that seemed to be bombs dropping from the sky, destroying everyone... Idk if that's even possible to code, or if it was some kind of weapon spec... Help? xD

item.title: Super Epic Move
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Mack n cheese, post:12, topic:392881”]i r teh sp00n f33der.

if (command.startsWith("poopinmyshoe") { stillgfx(572, absY, absX); stillgfx(571, absY, absX); stillgfx(582, absY+1, absX+1); stillgfx(498, absY+4, absX-1); stillgfx(498, absY-4, absX+1); stillgfx(498, absY+1, absX+4); stillgfx(498, absY-1, absX-4); stillgfx(498, absY, absX-4); stillgfx(498, absY, absX+4); stillgfx(498, absY+4, absX); stillgfx(498, absY-4, absX); stillgfx(547, absY+1, absX-1); stillgfx(547, absY-1, absX+1); stillgfx(547, absY+1, absX+1); stillgfx(547, absY-1, absX-1); stillgfx(437, absY, absX-1); stillgfx(437, absY, absX+1); stillgfx(437, absY+1, absX); stillgfx(437, absY-1, absX); stillgfx(287, absY, absX); stillgfx(287, absY+3, absX); stillgfx(287, absY-3, absX); stillgfx(287, absY, absX+3); stillgfx(287, absY, absX-3); stillgfx(287, absY+2, absX-2); stillgfx(287, absY-2, absX+2); stillgfx(287, absY+2, absX+2); stillgfx(287, absY-2, absX-2); stillgfx(453, absY+1, absX-1); stillgfx(453, absY-1, absX+1); stillgfx(453, absY+1, absX+1); stillgfx(453, absY-1, absX-1); stillgfx(453, absY, absX-1); stillgfx(453, absY, absX+1); stillgfx(453, absY+1, absX); stillgfx(453, absY-1, absX); stillgfx(453, absY+2, absX-2); stillgfx(453, absY-2, absX+2); stillgfx(453, absY+2, absX+2); stillgfx(453, absY-2, absX-2); stillgfx(453, absY, absX-2); stillgfx(453, absY, absX+2); stillgfx(453, absY+2, absX); stillgfx(453, absY-2, absX); stillgfx(453, absY, absX-3); stillgfx(453, absY, absX+3); stillgfx(453, absY+3, absX); stillgfx(453, absY-3, absX); stillgfx(453, absY+1, absX-2); stillgfx(453, absY-1, absX+2); stillgfx(453, absY+1, absX+2); stillgfx(453, absY-1, absX-2); stillgfx(453, absY+2, absX-1); stillgfx(453, absY-2, absX+1); stillgfx(453, absY+2, absX+1); stillgfx(453, absY-2, absX-1); stillgfx(453, absY+1, absX-3); stillgfx(453, absY-1, absX+3); stillgfx(453, absY+1, absX+3); stillgfx(453, absY-1, absX-3); stillgfx(453, absY+3, absX-1); stillgfx(453, absY-3, absX+1); stillgfx(453, absY+3, absX+1); stillgfx(453, absY-3, absX-1); attackPlayersWithin(444, 10, 30); attackPlayersWithin(444, 70, 5); }

fyi it attacks all the players within a certain area. remove it if you want.[/quote]

public void divideByZero(int radius) {
    stillgfx(gfxId, absY, absX);// Why the hell is it (y, x) ?
    // NOTE: This is for if you want the * pattern.
    for (int i = i; i <= radius; i++) {
        stillgfx(gfxId, absY - i, absX);
        stillgfx(gfxId, absY - i, absX - i);
        stillgfx(gfxId, absY - i, absX + i);
        stillgfx(gfxId, absY, absX + i);
        stillgfx(gfxId, absY, absX - i);
        stillgfx(gfxId, absY + i, absX);
        stillgfx(gfxId, absY + i, absX + i);
        stillgfx(gfxId, absY + i, absX - i);
    }

    // NOTE: This is if you want just a square.
    for (int i = 1; i <= radius; i++) {
        for (int j = 1; j <= radius; j++) {
            stillgfx(gfxId, absY + i, absX - j);
            stillgfx(gfxId, absY + i, absX + j);
            stillgfx(gfxId, absY - i, absX - j);
            stillgfx(gfxId, absY - i, absX + j);
        }
    }
}

Read full topic

stillgfx(453, absY+1, absX-2); stillgfx(453, absY-1, absX+2); stillgfx(453, absY+1, absX+2); stillgfx(453, absY-1, absX-2); stillgfx(453, absY+2, absX-1); stillgfx(453, absY-2, absX+1); stillgfx(453, absY+2, absX+1); item.title: Super Epic Move
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

It’s just a bunch of graphics, an animation, and a loop that goes through all players and applies them dead.

A lot of servers have it named something like “killall” or something, so search that first. Otherwise, if you have any idea what you’re doing, call an animation, a few gfx, some gfx that are next to you, and use a loop to search through each player and apply them dead.

Read full topic

item.title: Super Epic Move
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

It’s probably the most simple thing in existence.

‘setAnimation(emoteid);’
‘stillgfx(absX, absY, gfxid);’

There is also a method that lets you attack anyone within a certain radius, look for it.
It’s honestly not that hard.

Read full topic
